org.pircbotx
Class User

java.lang.Object
  org.pircbotx.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<User>
public class User
extends Object
implements Comparable<User>

Represents a User on the server. Contains all the available information about the user as well as some useful delegate methods like giving op or voice status.

Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Origionally by: Paul James Mutton for PircBot

Forked and Maintained by in PircBotX: Leon Blakey

public int compareTo(User other)

isOp

public boolean isOp(Channel chan)
Checks if the user is an operator in the specified channel

Returns:

op

public void op(Channel chan)
Attempts to give Operator status to this user in the given channel. Simply calls PircBotX.op(org.pircbotx.Channel, org.pircbotx.User)

Parameters:
chan - The Channel to perform the Op in

deOp

public void deOp(Channel chan)
Attempts to remove Operator status from this user in the given channel. Simply calls PircBotX.deOp(org.pircbotx.Channel, org.pircbotx.User)

Parameters:
chan - The Channel to perform the DeOp in

hasVoice

public boolean hasVoice(Channel chan)
Checks if the user has voice status in the given channel

Returns:
True if the user has voice, false if not

voice

public void voice(Channel chan)
Attempts to give Voice status to this user in the given channel. Simply calls PircBotX.voice(org.pircbotx.Channel, org.pircbotx.User)

Parameters:
chan - The channel to give voice in

deVoice

public void deVoice(Channel chan)
Attempts to remove Voice status from this user in the given channel. Simply calls PircBotX.deVoice(org.pircbotx.Channel, org.pircbotx.User)

Parameters:
chan - The channel to give voice in
